prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a regal appearance and sharp icy spikes.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a penguin but has a powerful steel armor.
Generate a majestic creature that combines aquatic features with a royal flair.
Show me a Pokemon that commands the ocean with its metallic body and fierce demeanor.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that looks both elegant and intimidating in battle.
Give me a Pokemon that stands tall in a tuxedo-like design with bright blue accents.
Make a formidable creature that embodies both grace and strength in the water.
